name: Santa vs. The Robbers
description:
My family and I made this game for the GB Studio Christmas Jam (pardon the bugs)! Help Santa deliver presents to the neighborhood while avoiding the air robbers.

Fly the sleigh over chimneys and press "B" so that Santa can hop down and fill the house with presents. When Santa's done, he jumps back into the sleigh. Be careful though, if a robber captures the sleigh while Santa is in the house, it's Game Over! Fill all 5 houses to win! 

Controls: 

  • Movement - arrow keys
  • Hop into chimney from sleigh - X button (keyboard), B button (mobile player)
  • Pause - Enter
